span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象指定特定密钥容器的访问权限。 objects specify access rights for specific key containers.

span.span: A object that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建一个 对象，该对象可用于循环访问集合以获取每个项。Use this method to create a object that can be used to iterate through the collection to get each item. 使用枚举器的 属性可获取集合中当前指向的项。Use the property of the enumerator to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用枚举器的 方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method of the enumerator to move to the next item in the collection. 使用枚举器的 方法可移至初始位置。Use the method of the enumerator to move to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 创建 对象或使用 方法将枚举器移动到集合中的第一项后，必须调用 方法。After you create a object or use the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the method. 否则， 属性表示的项是不确定的。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined.
